alert.note: Alert for Northwest Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 9:57AM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern New London County. In New York, Northwest Suffolk, and Southwest Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Refreezing on untreated surfaces is expected late this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
